376734893834633218.name: "Isoleti"

Calling.description: Roll 1D6 to determine the field at random, then roll 2D6 to randomly select a stamp. That becomes the designated stamp. If the check succeeds, a spirit corresponding to the stamp can be summoned.

376734893834633218.magicalName: Solitary Melodia of the Celestial Realm

Calling.description: Roll 1D6 to randomly determine the field, then roll 2D6 to randomly select a target stamp. That stamp becomes the designated stamp. If you succeed in rolling with this stamp, you can summon a spirit corresponding to that stamp.
